description: PayWhirls intuitive tools make recurring billing easy. Sell subscriptions, pre-orders, payment plans, or whatever billing arrangements you can dream up.

actions.name: createCustomer
actions.description: Create a new customer. This is required before binding a customer to a plan via a subscription.

actions.name: getCustomer
actions.description: Retrieve a selection of customers. Useful for keeping track of customers in a local database.

actions.name: searchCustomersSubscription
actions.description: Get a list of subscriptions associated with a given customer. Useful for determining which services a customer is currently expecting.

actions.name: subscribeCustomer
actions.description: Enroll a customer in an existing plan. The customer must have a valid payment method on file.
